Literature.Title: Self-Assembly of Antimicrobial Peptoids Impacts Their Biological Effects on ESKAPE Bacterial Pathogens.

Literature.Author: Diamond G, Molchanova N, Herlan C, Fortkort JA, Lin JS, Figgins E, Bopp N, Ryan LK

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Enterococcus faecium(MIC=1.56µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus USA 300 LAC(MIC=6.25µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus USA 300 LAC(MIC=1.56µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae KPLN649(MIC=12.5µg/ml),Acinetobacter baumannii AB5075(MIC=25µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa LESB58(MIC=12.5µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa LESB58(MIC=50µg/ml),Enterobacter cloacae 218R1(MIC=100µg/ml),HSV-1(30-40% REP=20µg/ml)
